summary: The Rio Bikini. Take this sexy South American classic to spice up your favorite Skyrim femme fatale.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/description.jpg[/img]
The Rio Bikini is made from sugar and spice and everything that makes you thank goodness you're a dude.

[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/location.jpg[/img]
Gerdur, the trusted matriarch from Riverwood, has a secret. She keeps it from everyone, even her husband Hod. Once in the Frostfall of 23, Gerdur was transported to Skyrim through a portal from another world. In that world, Gerdur was considered to be a famous Rio bikini model named Ruthie Davenport. Now, years after, all she has left of that life lies in the strange black bag located next to her nightstand.

[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/installation.jpg[/img]
Unrar the archive and place in "Data" folder. If you have any conflicts or issues with any aspect of your game upon installing this mod, please uninstall using the same method, but backwards.

Please be aware this outfit is for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48406/?]Khmera[/url] body style, which is a UNP-based body. It is compatible ONLY with a UNP-type skin textures such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Navetsea UNP[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin[/url], etc. The outfit is not for CBBE, Pandora, and Ladybody-type bodies, as they use a different UV to map their textures.

[IMG]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/permissions.jpg[/IMG]
You may not upload, or distribute any parts of this Skyrim mod without my expressed permission.
author: ReaverLord
